renderTree

private static int renderTree(java.util.ArrayList<DataField> nodes,
                              java.lang.Object parentContainer,
                              RendererFactory rendererFactory,
                              boolean setDisabled,
                              int childOffset)
Recursively render a (sub)tree of DataFields.

Parameters:
nodes - a ArrayList of DataFields to render
parentContainer - the (rendered) parent of the current ArrayList of DataFields
rendererFactory - the Renderer to use
setDisabled - whether children should be disabled at creation
childOffset - count of how many children have been placed in the parent container
Returns:
the actualized childOffset
